text: Hi all, do you know if HubSpot has a column that stores whether a contact is archived or not? I would like to do an SQL query on our HubSpot database that only shows non-archived contacts
Is it me, or does the community forum remove replies if they contain code? Or is it only specific sensitive information that gets my replies removed?
it might be a security feature, for Code there is a specific "HTML" option that you can choose:
I removed the example API key and removed any personal info (which was dummy data), and now it is no longer getting removed.

Reminder: Did you know you can message <@U02162GK9SP|sprocky> at any time to get HubSpot development questions answered? It’s an experimental chat bot built to tackle developer questions. It won’t read your code, but can answer a lot of questions about building on the HubSpot platform.

Hi all, I'm running into an issue mapping non-HubSpot form fields and HubSpot properties. I created a static html multiple choice quiz and plan to map the responses to newly-created single-line fields within HubSpot. Most of the responses are working as intended, however I'm seeing a few questions take the label as the response instead of one of the multiple choice options (screenshots and code snippets will be added). Any assistance resolving this issue is greatly appreciated!
Here's a screenshot from the submission details. Under q7, q13, and q18 should either be "True" or "False", not the label of the question itself

What is the correct API end-point to retrieve a list by ID. The one mentioned <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/lists/get_list|here> is giving list not found with ID error for every single list ID. The lists exist in the system however, need some help if anyone has experience with this end-point

Hi everyone!
Maybe you can help me with this.
Do you know if it’s possible to add a token like “firstname” on a CTA?
Thanks
Yeah, I’m unsure if we have automation around api keys but I do know that our moderators will take down a post that has an API key in it to try to protect that person from themselves.

Hey Folks,

Can can give me a solution on how set my company as marketing contacts. I am aware of that we can set our contacts as marketing but what I need is companies to be set as marketing contacts.

Thanks
You can't, why would you set companies as marketing contacts? you can't send marketing emails to companies
